original_text: All the believers continued to meet together often. They shared all their things with each other.
korean_text: 믿는 사람이 다 함께 있어 모든 물건을 서로 통용하고

sentences.original_text: All the believers continued to meet together often
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 믿는 사람들은 계속해서 자주 함께 모였습니다

sentences.original_text: They shared all their things with each other
